name: ViewDimensions
desc: A view’s size and its alignment guides in its own coordinate space.

items.name: subscript(HorizontalAlignment) -> CGFloat
items.desc: Gets the value of the given horizontal guide.

items.name: subscript(VerticalAlignment) -> CGFloat
items.desc: Gets the value of the given vertical guide.

items.name: subscript(explicit _: VerticalAlignment) -> CGFloat?
items.desc: Gets the explicit value of the given alignment guide in this view, or nil if no such value exists.

items.name: subscript(explicit _: HorizontalAlignment) -> CGFloat?
items.desc: Gets the explicit value of the given alignment guide in this view, or nil if no such value exists.

items.name: static func == (ViewDimensions, ViewDimensions) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two view dimensions are equal.

items.name: static func != (Self, Self) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two view dimensions are unequal.
